mainText.attr1: You can only issue orders to friendly ships.
Select a ship or ships (you can either left click + hold + drag - or left click with SHIFT to select multiple ships).
Right click on an object or empty space.
Orders depending on the target of the right click.
Friendly ship - form up with right clicked ship
Friendly ship - if repair ship - repair right clicked ship
Enemy ship or platform - if selected ship has weapons then attack enemy object otherwise go to object
If friendly or enemy go to base
If friendly and selected ship is a cargo ship carrying a cargo pod then dock with base
If friendly and selected ship is a marine ship then dock with base (if already close by)
If enemy and selected ship is a marine ship then invade base
If selected ship can pick up object - then pick it up
Go to position - see Ship Orders Move Command topic for more details
